
"libogg" version:
	1.3.2

"libvorbis" version:
	1.3.5

Downloaded From:
   http://www.vorbis.com

Summary:
The "libogg" library is used to decode the *.ogg container format.  The "libvorbis" library is used to decode the Ogg Vorbis audio data contained within the *.ogg file.  The "libvorbis" library depends on the "libogg" library and there folder must be side-by-side in order to compile them both.

This library is used by Corona on the Win32 platform.
